section.name: Overview
section.p: Fulcrum Crypto Library is an extension library for Fulcrum YAAFI to support transparent decryption of configuration files.

section.name: Cryptography Support
section.p: The YAAFI container supports decryption of configuration files using Sun's JCA (Java Crypto Architecture). The encryption/decryption is based on DES using 56 bit key length.

subsection.name: JDK 1.3.x
subsection.p: For JDK 1.3.x the Java Cryptography Extension (JCE) 1.2.2 needs to be installed. Furthermore you need to add the jce1_2_2.jar to your Maven repository and project.xml

subsection.name: JDK 1.4.x
subsection.p: The current JDK's have the JCA built-in therefore no extra configuration is required.
